definitions.title: adj. gent.
definitions.body: Arabian (in strictly ethnographic sense, Nö:l. c.);—´[[הָע]] as subst. Ne 2:19 Geshem the Arabian, so Ne 6:1; pl. [[הָעַרְבִים]] Ne 4:1, 2Ch 21:16, 2Ch 22:1; also (written as NH) [[הערביים]] 2Ch 26:7 (Qr [[הָעַרְבִים]]), and even [[הָעַרְבִיאִים]] 2Ch 17:11.
